turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Columbus, Arkansas.
turn.2: Columbus, Arkansas  Columbus is an unincorporated community in Hempstead County, Arkansas, United States.
turn.4: Columbus is located on Arkansas Highway 73, west-northwest of Hope.
turn.5: What kind of economy did the community have?
turn.6: Columbus has a post office with ZIP code 71831. Columbus was a farming community up until the 1960s.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: There was once a bank owned by the Wilson family of Columbus, along with several stores and a school, the most notable store being a general store owned by David Mitchell.
turn.9: Does the community still have any of these anchors?
turn.10: The stores have since been torn down.
turn.11: Is the school still in operation?
turn.12: During the 1940s, Columbus school consolidated with Hope School District.
